meta.title: Arclet Copier - Quick URL Copy Chrome Extension
meta.description: A powerful Chrome extension for quick URL copying with smart parameter filtering, custom template system, batch copying, short URL generation, and QR code generation.

hero.title: Quick URL Copy
hero.subtitle: Powerful Chrome Extension
hero.description: Copy current page URL with one click. Supports smart parameter filtering, custom templates, batch copying, short URL generation, and QR code generation. Boost your productivity.

items.title: One-Click URL Copy
items.description: Support popup click, hotkey silent copy, and right-click menu access

items.title: Smart Parameter Cleaning
items.description: Three-level modes: Off, Smart, Aggressive. Smart mode removes only tracking parameters

items.title: Custom Parameter Rules
items.description: Support custom tracking and functional parameter lists with add, delete, and edit capabilities

items.title: Custom Template System
items.description: Create personalized copy format templates with 11 variable fields, real-time preview and validation

items.title: Batch Copy Feature
items.description: Multi-window tab batch copying with filters, deduplication, and multiple export formats

items.title: Short URL Generation
items.description: Support is.gd and TinyURL services with caching mechanism and concurrent limits

items.title: QR Code Generation
items.description: Generate QR codes for current page URLs, support copying QR code images to clipboard

items.title: Modern Theme
items.description: Arc-style design with Auto/Light/Dark modes and multiple theme colors

items.title: Hotkey Support
items.description: Ctrl+Shift+C silent copy, right-click menu, popup Ctrl+C quick operation

items.title: Multi-Language Support
items.description: Support 9 languages: Chinese, English, Japanese, German, French, Spanish, etc.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Arclet Copier

items.question: How do I install Arclet Copier?
items.answer: You can install Arclet Copier from the Chrome Web Store or Edge Add-ons Store with one click. Alternatively, download the source package from GitHub for manual installation.

items.question: What is smart parameter filtering?
items.answer: Smart parameter filtering intelligently removes tracking parameters (like UTM, Facebook, Google Analytics) while preserving functional parameters that are necessary for the webpage to work properly.

items.question: Can I create custom copy templates?
items.answer: Yes! Arclet Copier supports a powerful template system with 11 variable fields including {{url}}, {{title}}, {{hostname}}, {{date}}, {{time}}, and more. You can create personalized formats for different use cases.

items.question: How does batch copying work?
items.answer: The batch feature allows you to select multiple browser tabs and copy all their URLs at once. You can filter by window scope, remove duplicates, and choose from multiple export formats.

items.question: Is Arclet Copier free to use?
items.answer: Yes, Arclet Copier is completely free and open source. You can use all features without any limitations or subscriptions.

items.question: Which browsers are supported?
items.answer: Arclet Copier works on Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and other Chromium-based browsers. It requires Manifest V3 support.

items.question: How do I use keyboard shortcuts?
items.answer: Use Ctrl+Shift+C (Cmd+Shift+C on Mac) for silent URL copying. You can also access features through right-click context menu or the extension popup.

1.6.4.title: v1.6.4
changes: Custom Parameter Rules: All-new URL parameter configuration feature supporting custom tracking and functional parameter lists

1.6.3.title: v1.6.3
changes: Short URL Cache Optimization: Fixed short URL caching logic to ensure consistency using cleaned URLs, improving cache hit rate
Performance Optimization: Improved short URL throttling and concurrent request management
Stability Enhancement: Added health checks and concurrency locks for Offscreen documents to prevent duplicate creation and resource conflicts

1.6.2.title: v1.6.2
changes: Visual Optimization: Simplified toggle switch and three-position switch styles for better visual consistency
Performance Optimization: Removed unused CSS rules and translation texts to reduce bundle size

1.6.1.title: v1.6.1
changes: Notification System Upgrade: All-new notification system with Arc-style in-page Toast notifications, supporting anti-duplicate display and better visual effects
Template System Enhancement: Comprehensive improvement to custom template functionality, redesigned template editor interface for modern UI experience
Template Engine Optimization: Improved template validation logic and enhanced template variable processing with better error handling
Emoji Selector: Added categorized emoji selector for template icons with smooth scrolling and category navigation
Localization Enhancement: Added Traditional Chinese support and improved multilingual interface text

1.6.0.title: v1.6.0
changes: Custom Template System: Brand new custom copy format template functionality supporting creation, editing, and deletion of personalized copy templates
Rich Template Variables: Support for 11 template variables ({{url}}, {{originalUrl}}, {{title}}, {{hostname}}, {{domain}}, {{shortUrl}}, {{date}}, {{time}}, {{datetime}}, {{timestamp}}, {{iso}})
Template Management Interface: Dedicated template management page with emoji icon selection, real-time preview, and template validation

1.5.0.title: v1.5.0
changes: Batch Copy Feature: New batch copy page supporting selection of multiple tabs for bulk URL copying
Smart Filtering: Support for filtering tabs by window scope (current window or all windows)
Preview Function: Preview content before copying to ensure results meet expectations
Batch Settings: Independent batch operation settings supporting web page filtering, deduplication, and copy format selection
High Performance: Support for efficient handling of large numbers of tabs with real-time preview

1.4.2.title: v1.4.2
changes: CSS Priority Fix: Fixed theme color override issues caused by CSS selector priority, improving theme system stability
Arclet Copier official website launch: https://arcletcopier.com/

Animation Effects: Added rotation animation effect to header icons for enhanced visual experience

QR Popup Interface Optimization: Enhanced QR code popup layout, optimized element spacing and divider line display for improved user experience

1.3.1.title: v1.3.1

1.3.0.title: v1.3.0
changes: QR Code Generation: Added QR code generation functionality for current page URLs with theme adaptation
Dark Theme Support: Complete dark theme adaptation supporting system theme automatic detection and manual switching
Smart URL Cleanup: Upgraded URL parameter cleanup feature adding smart mode (removing only tracking parameters while preserving functional parameters)
Adaptive Three-Position Slider: Implemented new adaptive slider component supporting width auto-adjustment based on text length
